articles.author: Paul Davidson
articles.title: CFPB finds consumers hit with junk fees for auto, student loans, more - USA TODAY
articles.description: The Consumer Financial Protection Bureau found Americans were hit with many junk fees for auto loans, mortgages, student loans and payday lending.
articles.content: Consumers have been socked with myriad illegal junk fees in bank deposits, auto loans, mortgages, payday lending and student loans, according to a sweeping report Wednesday by the Consumer Financial … [+2813 chars]
